22#include <sys/cdefs.h>
23#ifndef lint
24__RCSID("$NetBSD: gmt2local.c,v 1.5 2017/01/24 23:29:13 christos Exp $");
25#endif
26
27#ifdef HAVE_CONFIG_H
28#include "config.h"
29#endif
30
31#include <netdissect-stdinc.h>
32
33#include <stdio.h>
34
35#ifdef HAVE_OS_PROTO_H
36#include "os-proto.h"
37#endif
38
39#include "gmt2local.h"
40
41/*
42 * Returns the difference between gmt and local time in seconds.
43 * Use gmtime() and localtime() to keep things simple.
44 */
45int32_t
46gmt2local(time_t t)
47{
48 register int dt, dir;
49 register struct tm *gmt, *loc;
50 struct tm sgmt;
51
52 if (t == 0)
53 t = time(NULL);
54 gmt = &sgmt;
55 *gmt = *gmtime(&t);
56 loc = localtime(&t);
57 dt = (loc->tm_hour - gmt->tm_hour) * 60 * 60 +
58 (loc->tm_min - gmt->tm_min) * 60;
59
60 /*
61 * If the year or julian day is different, we span 00:00 GMT
62 * and must add or subtract a day. Check the year first to
63 * avoid problems when the julian day wraps.
64 */
65 dir = loc->tm_year - gmt->tm_year;
66 if (dir == 0)
67 dir = loc->tm_yday - gmt->tm_yday;
68 dt += dir * 24 * 60 * 60;
69
70 return (dt);
71}
72
